title: champ mastery gone
body: after the new update i logged in and all my champ mastery are gone its resetted to 0 all my lvl 7 or lower all gone tried relogging 5 times still no change.

replies.body: I'm a bit late to give you this information, but as you probably know the issue has been fixed! Most of the issues that occur can be found on the [Server Status ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)Page and we're pretty quick to get them resolved. Let me know if you run into any other issues and we'll be more than happy to help you out!

The same happened to me :-(
Rito pls
